name: Colorblind (CWT93)
description:
Hi, 

This game is called ”Colorblind”, as it shows that you can’t always see the full picture. This game was made for the MFGJ, or My First Game Jam: Summer 2019. We were 2 developers to make this game, and for me it was my first gamejam, and for https://icegold03.itch.io/ it was his third. This game is very glitchy and rough around the edges, because we tried to make it a learning experience. Some glitches may include: The UI not updating correctly, stars in level selection are not working and the player gets stuck on walls(a lot). But nonetheless, here’s the game. 

Enjoy! 

CWT93
